MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH14 postcode area of Balerno. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.44pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Mansfield road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:19PM on Wednesday 10 February 2021.
